name: Bob Sacamano
text:
Wish there was more attention to quality and continuity at all locations.

I have ordered Cajun bread here many many many times and it never comes out the ‚Ä¶More

name: Bruce Kiper
text: Eh, typical. Ordered beef, got sausage. I asked for crisp on the bottom cause usually like wet paper, but it was dry like no sauce. Greasy as you can see, cause it stayed in the oven longer.

name: Liz Suarez
text: The employees were not wearing masks and pizza wasn't cooked well done the dough felt like it was raw.

name: J P
text: We ordered for delivery this week and I have to say I was so impressed. Our pizzas were perfect and so was our cookie cake. The pizza was delivered in a timely manner and it was fresh and hot. Way to go guys, awesome job.

name: Christopher Huels
text: Omg God that was the best pizza ever tonight yummy!!! And the service was very prompt.  My only complaint was I had called to give the kitchen a thank you and they dropped the ball lol. Or maybe it was my phone. But either way I loved and enjoyed with my little happy dance.

name: Dakota Hull
text: Everything tasted great. Just would‚Äôve been a little better if the pizzas we got (2 of them) were actually cut.

text:
Plastic in food!
Used to love this place. However, i ordered an italian sub last night and ate a quarter of it before i realized there were chunks of plastic all over it inside. ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian Shinawongse
text: Must try the salad! It‚Äôs pretty good. The different options of crust flavor is unique.

name: Richard A
text: We love this place. We get their pizza every Wednesday. I highly recommend their cheese bread with marinara sauce. It's the best.

name: Kylie Reed
text: Called my order in for pickup on my way back home, walked in and paid, the woman taking orders over the phone came in and returned to her phone. The guys in there were nice. Once home we realized our order was very wrong so i called the ‚Ä¶More

text: Their Pizza is awesome especially for the price can't get any better

text: These people delivered the wrong order. When I call to get the issue resolved, they expressed there was nothing they could do. Which makes absolutely no sense since I have the receipts which has my correct order detailed on it. Absolutely horrible service, makes the hungry Howdie brand look like trash.

name: Coral Kull
text: If you ever order delivery from this place and you have dogs,request the female driver with tattoos! She‚Äôs absolutely amazing, she started bringing treats for the doggies. Everytime my husband and I order from here she‚Äôs always our driver. She‚Äôs always on time and so very happy! The other employees should really follow her example.

text: nice but the pizza is just average or ok.

text: Ordered not too long ago... and the girl with tattoos is awesome! Always prompt and happy! Best driver I‚Äôve met!!!

text: It's close bu, convenient, and has stuffed crust, which is a great thing to have with pizza.

text: I don't want to c a person delivering my food w/ no gloves on & underwear showing

text: Fast service!!! Great pizza for the price!!

name: Keith Groves
text: I love this location. Staff is always friendly. Best thing about this location is, I have never had to wait the full quoted time for delivery. Very fast and always here ten minutes if not sooner then what was quoted over the phone.

name: Kasey Lynn
text: Service and quality of food is the worst ever.  No matter how much you stress and even have them repeat the order back to you,  it is WRONG.  I've called & told the manager but nothing changes.  EVERY SINGLE TIME the order is WRONG.  I just don't understand why it's IMPOSSIBLE to listen and make an order. ü§¶

name: Top Cat
text: Good deals on good pizza. Easy to order and friendly. Always ready on time and get the order right. The Works pizza was a good deal for $10 but went up a couple of bucks. Still a good deal with free flavored crust. Getting in and out of the parking lot a little tricky due to location, so be careful with the heavy traffic around!

name: Suzanne Schroeder
text:
Use to be the best pizza in
Land O Lakes.  Now their crust tastes like cardboard.

name: Brandy Byrum
text: Jessica you should NOT be dealing with the public! You lack customer service skill as well as the ability to make a pizza! And to give a wrong phone number to your supervisor.  Shame on you! I know what I ordered and it was Not thin crust burnt pizza! Worst experience ever with Hungry Howie's!

name: Review King
text: Been eating here off and on since I was a little kid. Nearing 30; still a great, quick, simple place to order pizza! Thanks for replacing frozen pizza for so many years!

name: Nichole Rodriguez
text: Always fresh and hot!

name: Laura Scott
text: 23 minutes late on my order and embarrass their actually paid for it, Jesscia the new manager explained she us has been out of the loop for a few years, $3.00 credit. I did not want anything else from this place, everytime I give this place a thought of improvement I get more disappointed!! Do not waste your time or money.  üôÅ

name: Mark Keith
text: I would give more stars if this location was open at 11am instead of waiting until 4pm to be able to order. I love the food it's great but the hours suck as I would love to have a sub from here at lunch.

name: sarah A
text: Friendly staff and the pizza was good!

text: The food was not ready and not cooked all the way.and they. Did not put any garlic butter/chesse on my bread.this is all with the owner there helpin with my order.im going to bed hungry..

text: I order a large pizza with black olives on one 1/2. They tried to change me over $12. I point to the 1 topping large for 6.99 on the menu and they pretended that it came up as 12 because I ordered thin crust. That is a lie, they just tried ‚Ä¶More

text: The best pizza I ever had. The service was fast and friendly even though they were super busy. I will be back again and again

name: Kevin Staninger
text: I ordered the Works and a junior cheese pizza for my son. All thumbs up here. I ordered online and it was ready in 20 minutes. Employees were very nice. Very inexpensive too.

text: Food was pizza. While waiting on our food the staff got in a fight about a delivery guys mistake and tons of profanity thrown back and forth with us just standing there.
